test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is logged in and redirected to their default workspace.

test_scenarios.name: Workspace Switching
steps: Click on the workspace name in the top left corner.
Select another workspace from the dropdown menu.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is switched to the selected workspace and the new workspace's channels are displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Sending a Direct Message
steps: Click on 'Direct Messages' to expand the section.
Search or select a user from the direct messages list.
Type a message in the message input field.
Press Enter/Return to send the message.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Message is sent successfully and visible in the conversation window.
